Title: GIFPlayer
Description: GIFPlayer provide a XAML control for Windows 8.1 and Windows phone store apps, which will enable you to display GIF animations.
HomeWiki:
Description

GIFPlayer provide a XAML control for Windows 8.1 and Windows phone store apps, which will enable you to display GIF animations.

NuGet

Package available on NuGet : https://www.nuget.org/packages/GIFPlayer

How to use

After installing the NuGet package just add the namespace to your page : 

xmlns:gif="using:GIFPlayer"


Now you can add the GIF control to your page as follow : 

<gif:GIF IsAnimating="True" 
         Source="http://media.giphy.com/media/yv8iBjSfZs9IA/giphy.gif" />
